data.title: SAP.iO Foundries • SAP's Startup Accelerator
data.meta_description: Partner with SAP to accelerate your growth through our zero-cost startup accelerator programs located in 9 global innovation hubs.
data.text:
“I’m learning lessons that SAP has acquired through years of experience and applying them to my business so that we have a head start. I would recommend any company to look at SAP.iO as it is an invaluable resource for startups, especially ones focused on enterprises.”

Joanna RileyCEO & Co-Founder, Censia

“When an SAP customer integrates Zoovu, we both benefit from showcasing how solutions work together to provide everything a business needs to thrive and meet their customer needs and expectations. In essence, SAP and Zoovu complement each other and supercharge customer experiences as a unified solution.”

Lamees ButtSVP Global Alliances & Channels, Zoovu

“SAP is the premier solution employed by our customer base. To make it easier for our and SAP’s customers to understand their own supply chain by connecting in is a no-brainer.”

Stefani Pellinen-ChavezCOO, Ivaldi Group

“The supportive team from SAP.iO has been instrumental in helping MindBrige launch our partnership with SAP to bring our AI-powered financial risk discovery and anomaly detections solution to even more companies. I truly enjoyed being part of the cohort and look forward to continued collaboration with SAP partners and customers in the future.”

Solon AngelFounder, MindBridge

“SAP.iO’s team gave us a big push by connecting us to top SAP professionals and executives and putting us in front of clients. Their help was not only limited to the program but extends to now and beyond as well, as we are still talking with them and asking for their help from time to time.”

Ofir ZilberbergCEO, ARpalus
